prompt:
Nurse: That sounds like a good idea. Having some familiar items with you can make the hospital stay more comfortable. What kind of things are you planning to take?

Patient: bring me some comfort.

Nurse: That sounds like a great idea. Having familiar comforts can make a big difference during your stay. What kind of things are you packing?

Patient: I've got a

Nurse: I'm sorry, Simone, your voice cut out a bit there. Could you please repeat what you were saying?

Patient: some

Nurse: I'm sorry, Simone, your voice cut out a bit there. Could you please repeat what you were saying?

Patient: like, a scented candle. I'm not gonna like the candle, of course, but it has a nice aroma

responses.gpt4: That sounds like a lovely idea, Simone. A comforting aroma can be very soothing. Do you have a certain scent that relaxes you?
responses.our_model: That sounds lovely, scents can indeed bring a lot of comfort. What scent did you choose?
